content.description: A tricky start leads you into a small left-facing dihedral. Continue up to a small roof feature and undercling your way left while smearing your feet until it's possible to latch onto a very positive sidepull. Continue straight up to anchors.
content.protection: 6 bolts to a 2 bolt anchor shared with "Kind Veggie Brother"
content.location: Begin directly above a couple boulders at the base, where two parallel cracks trend up and right. Roughly 10 feet right of "Kind Veggie Brother."

content.description: Fun moves as you climb using both the arete down low and then transitioning into the vertical seams on the face following the line of bolts.
content.location: The bolted line just right of the obvious dihedral towards the left side of the wall.

content.description: Well-protected sport climb with fun moves up the left side of the wall.
content.location: The furthest left bolted route on the main wall. 20 feet down and right from the large pine tree.

content.description:
Fun slab moves up to a tiny roof feature where you'll find a very satisfying undercling to latch onto. Move past the last two bolts on small, but positive holds (crux). Look for anchor up and to the right.

Originally rated 5.11a/b
content.protection: 6 Bolts to a 2 bolt anchor shared with "You Be Lichen It"
content.location: About 15 feet right of the obvious arete and "Rusty Knife."

content.description: Fun moves up a dihedral. Crux seemed to be getting off the ground and established into the corner.
content.protection:
Standard rack. Can easily use anchors on Rusty Knife.

One bolt protects the moves up to the dihedral.
content.location: The obvious dihedral toward the left side of the wall.

content.description: Starts with pulling a roof (stick clipÂ the second bolt? I did). This however is not the crux. Commence up a vertical face with many sloping crips and bad feet with the occasional side pull. (Seems to collect a bit of dirt and cat litter...which detracted from the routes overall experience) None the less the roof was exciting and the face is very aesthetic.
